page.title: 04Where Norton goes to shop.
page.content: We sent out a questionnaire on where people went to buy different things. From the results the most popular shopping areas were the local shops followed by Hanley. Burslem, although closer didnot do as well.But it was clear that where you went shopping depended on what you wanted to buy.For instance newspapers were practically all bought from the local shop, but clothes were usually purchased from Hanley,where there was greater choice. The local hairdressing shops were also used a great deal, whilst Hanley did well for electrical goods and furniture though in these catergories Burslem out marked the local shops. Surprisingly hardware tended to be bought locally, though this may be due to the local hardware retailer being of a good standard. Food was also bought in the area rather than town supermarkets.
